author: COMSOL
description:
This tutorial illustrates how to set up and solve a multiphysics problem involving coupled equations for mass, energy, and momentum transport.

It is a good example of how a model can be set up step by step, first solving for flow, then flow and heat, and finally flow, heat, and exothermic chemistry.
label: thermal_decomposition.mph
name: root
